title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competencies: Metadata-Driven e-Learning Design: Project-Based Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning paths using metadata-based modeling tools
Learners accurately apply mathematical problem-solving procedures in a project-based learning environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners diagnose and improve learning design flaws more than three times through an AI-based scheduling system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
